system.description:
The Brutacorn can shoot a blue blast of energy on their next missile attack with any type of SHOTGUN. Screaming through the air, the blast makes a wicked guitar solo noise until it explodes on impact making a dazzling spectacle of light and sound. The Brutal Blast deals [[/roll 2D6]] damage.

Bonus Action: Can be cast outside of the Spell Phase.

WARNING!: If a 12 is rolled for damage the spell deals @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.GolSNvsGoLOK5zXR.JournalEntryPage.EsSamxdIc90gsyVw]{Blowback} damage to the Brutacorn instead. Dealing the 6 damage right to their face.
